title: Frontend Development
briefDescription: I create visually appealing and responsive user interfaces using modern tools and frameworks like React, Tailwind, and Material UI.
detailedDescription: Frontend Development involves crafting user-centric interfaces that are both visually appealing and highly functional. My expertise includes using React for dynamic single-page applications, Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling, and Material UI for creating professional and accessible components. I focus on ensuring seamless responsiveness and interactive designs to enhance user engagement.

title: Full-Stack Development
briefDescription: As a full-stack developer, I handle both frontend and backend development to deliver complete and efficient solutions.
detailedDescription: Full-Stack Development encompasses creating and managing both client-side and server-side functionalities. I use React and Material UI to develop dynamic UIs, and Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for backend logic and database management. I focus on building scalable and robust systems while maintaining code quality and performance.

title: API Integration
briefDescription: I integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services to enhance application functionality and user experience.
detailedDescription: API Integration is crucial for connecting various services and enhancing application functionality. I specialize in integrating RESTful APIs for real-time data exchange and working with third-party services like payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and authentication systems. My approach ensures secure, reliable, and efficient integration that boosts user experience.
